          <title>
            <string language="en">Apparent depth of water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Offensichtliche Tiefe des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Profondeur apparente de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Profundidade aparente da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Profondità apparente di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προφανές βάθος του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Profundidad evidente del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the water in the container appears to be 12 cm deep due to light refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">apparent depth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß das Wasser im 
Behälter scheint, 12 Zentimeter an der hellen Brechung tiefes zu 
liegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'eau dans le 
récipient semble être due profond de 12 centimètres à la 
réfraction légère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a água no recipiente
parece ser  profundo de 12 cm devido ao refraction claro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'acqua nel 
contenitore sembra essere profondo di 12 centimetri dovuto la 
rifrazione chiara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το ύδωρ στο 
εμπορευματοκιβώτιο εμφανίζεται να οφείλεται βαθύς 12 εκατ. στην
ελαφριά διάθλαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el agua en el 
envase aparece ser profundo de 12 centímetros debido a la refracción
ligera.</string>
          </description>
